wikipedia_page.main: Clare Mary Alice Shillington (born 8 January 1981) is an Irish former cricketer and the current coach of Typhoons. She played as a right-handed batter and appeared in 1 Test match, 90 One Day Internationals and 56 Twenty20 Internationals for Ireland between 1997 and 2018. She played in her final match for Ireland in November 2018, during the 2018 ICC Women's World Twenty20 tournament.
